name: Underfire
description:
Underfire is a dynamic multiplayer team war game. You have to fight on stragic maps using various weapons up to 8 players. By correctly managing your current arsenal and skills, you must lead your team to victory!

WAR


Players fight on the battlefield in angry PvP matches. There is a maximum of 4 players on each side. There are fast battles between them!

WEAPONS


Select different military classes with the "M" key to choose one of the many available weapons, so experience unique destructive weapons.

TACTICS AND INNOVATIONS


The game is constantly being developed! Change the outcome of the battle using the new weapons to be added in the future and take your ability to use weapons to the next level.

GAME ENGINE


Thanks to Unity, the game can be run on older PCs. But it will show all its capabilities on modern computers. Launched with the latest innovations, the Unity game engine offers great graphics to the Underfire game!
